name: loading doctor

wave_0_per_point2=ma=ma-(above(treb,1.3)*((int(rand(6))-2)*.01));
wave_0_per_point3=
wave_0_per_point4=mx=mx+(.0002*cos(ma));
wave_0_per_point5=my=my+(.0002*sin(ma));
wave_0_per_point6=
wave_0_per_point7=mx=if(above(mx,.95),(.95-mx),mx);
wave_0_per_point8=my=if(above(my,.95),(.95-my),my);
wave_0_per_point9=mx=if(below(mx,.05),(.95+mx),mx);
wave_0_per_point10=my=if(below(my,.05),(.95+my),my);

shapecode_3_border_g=1.000
shapecode_3_border_b=1.000
shapecode_3_border_a=0.100
per_frame_1=warp=0;
per_frame_2=wave_a=0;
per_frame_3=zoom=1+(bass+treb+mid)*.005;
per_frame_4=decay=.5;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=//// flexi's beat counter
per_frame_7=bt1 = bt1*0.95 + sqr(bass*3)*30/fps;
per_frame_8=mt1 = mt1*0.95 + sqr(mid*3)*30/fps;
per_frame_9=tt1 = tt1*0.95 + sqr(treb*3)*30/fps;
per_frame_10=bt2 = bt2 + bt1*0.005;
per_frame_11=mt2 = mt2 + mt1*0.005;
per_frame_12=tt2 = tt2 + tt1*0.005;
per_frame_13=q1 = .3*time + mt2 *0.01;
per_frame_14=q2 = .3*time + bt2 *0.01;
per_frame_15=q3 = .3*time + tt2 *0.01;
per_frame_16=
per_frame_17=q5=aspectx;
per_frame_18=q6=aspecty;
per_frame_19=
per_frame_20=
per_frame_21=speed= 45;  ////// tweak
per_frame_22=
per_frame_23=
per_frame_24=t0=t0+1/fps;
per_frame_25=q20= abs(sin(.001*speed*t0));
per_frame_26=q21= -sin(3.14+.001*speed*t0);
per_frame_27=monitor=q20;
per_frame_28=q29=bass+treb+mid;
per_frame_29=q11=q29*.1;
per_frame_30=q12=q11;
per_frame_31=q30=q29*2;
per_frame_32=q3=q30*2;
per_frame_33=q32=aspecty;
per_frame_34=atime=atime+q29*.01;
per_frame_35=q8=atime;
warp_1=`shader_body
warp_2=`{
warp_3=`ret = GetPixel(uv) - 0.08;
warp_4=`float2 uv1 = uv;
warp_5=`float2 d = texsize.zw*4;
warp_6=`float3 dx = GetBlur1(uv1 + float2(1,0)*d) - GetBlur1(uv1 - float2(1,0)*d);
warp_7=`float3 dy = GetBlur1(uv1 + float2(0,1)*d) - GetBlur1(uv1 - float2(0,1)*d);
warp_8=`d *= float2(dx.x,dy.x)*0.4;
warp_9=`uv1+=d;
warp_10=`//uv1 = frac(uv1);
warp_11=`ret.x = tex2d(sampler_fc_main, uv1).x;
warp_12=`ret.x -=(GetBlur1(uv1).x-ret.x)*0.05 + 0.004;
warp_13=`
warp_14=`ret.z = max(length(float2(dx.x,dy.x))*1.4,GetPixel(lerp(uv_orig,uv,-1) - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*texsize.zw*4).z) - 0.004;
warp_15=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{
comp_3=`uv = 0.5 + (uv-0.5)*float2(1,-1);
comp_4=`
comp_5=`    float2 d = texsize.zw*4;
comp_6=`    float3 dx = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(1,0)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(1,0)*d) );
comp_7=`    float3 dy = ( GetBlur1(uv+float2(0,1)*d)-GetBlur1(uv-float2(0,1)*d) );
comp_8=`
comp_9=`float2 uv_x = uv - float2(dx.y,dy.y)*0.1;
comp_10=`ret = GetBlur2(uv_x).x*float3(1,0,2)*saturate(1-GetPixel(uv).y);
comp_11=`ret = lerp(ret,pow(hue_shader.yzx,4),GetBlur1(uv_x).x);
comp_12=`ret *= saturate(1 - GetBlur3(uv).z*4);
comp_13=`ret = lerp(ret,1,pow(hue_shader,8)*GetPixel(saturate(uv - float2(dx.z,dy.z)*2)).y*1.4);
comp_14=`ret = lerp(ret,1,length(float2(dx.z,dy.z))*float3(2,2,2));
comp_15=`
comp_16=`ret = lerp(ret,pow(hue_shader,6).zxy*2,GetPixel(uv).z);
comp_17=`}
